A guardian aluum charm grants control over powerful aluumsâ€”metal and stone constructs created by the Pactmasters to help maintain order in the city of Katapesh. As long as you wear a guardian aluum's linked guardian aluum charm, that aluum follows your verbal commands.

Activate 2 command, envision

Frequency once per day

Effect The charm grants you control over an aluum you can see within 60 feet, as long as the target aluum is level 13 or less. This has the effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dominate] and allows a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save. If the aluum is currently under the control of someone wearing its linked charm, its saving throw is one degree higher than what is rolled. You can control only one aluum at a time with this activation, and controlling a new aluum ends the effect for one you had previously affected.
